participant_1.name: Ethan Sullivan
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Ethan is focused on his career and enjoys the finer things in life. He is confident and enjoys socializing with others.
participant_1.background: i grew up in manhattan. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Sofia Ramirez
participant_2.personality: Sofia is adventurous and open-minded, embracing life with positivity. She enjoys her work and values her relationships, often seeking new experiences.
participant_2.background: i also have a dog walking business. i've three dogs. my father was a door to door salesman. i am in an open polyamorous relationship. i like to watch the olympics.
